entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as having a past, present, and future connection with Harry Potter. (Excerpt: 'Voldemort... is my past, present and future, Harry Potter ...')

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, mentioned as being connected to Voldemort in the past, present, and future. (Excerpt: 'Voldemort... is my past, present and future, Harry Potter ...')

entities.name: tom marvolo riddle
entities.description: The real name of Lord Voldemort, mentioned as being used by him at Hogwarts. (Excerpt: 'TOM MARVOLO RIDDLE')

entities.name: salazar slytherin
entities.description: A wizard and one of the founders of Hogwarts, mentioned as having a blood connection with Voldemort through his mother's side. (Excerpt: 'I, in whose veins runs the blood of Salazar Slytherin himself, through my mother’s side')

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for wizards and witches, mentioned as a place where Voldemort used his alias name. (Excerpt: 'You think I was going to use my filthy Muggle father’s name for ever? I, in whose veins runs the blood of Salazar Slytherin himself, through my mother’s side?')

relationships.description: Voldemort is connected to Harry Potter in the past, present, and future. (Excerpt: 'Voldemort... is my past, present and future, Harry Potter ...')
Voldemort used the alias name Tom Marvolo Riddle at Hogwarts. (Excerpt: 'TOM MARVOLO RIDDLE')
Salazar Slytherin has a blood connection with Voldemort through his mother's side. (Excerpt: 'I, in whose veins runs the blood of Salazar Slytherin himself, through my mother’s side')
Voldemort attended Hogwarts and used his alias name there. (Excerpt: 'You think I was going to use my filthy Muggle father’s name for ever?')
